title: New: Wolf Alice – Storms
body:
I love **Wolf Alice** for so many reasons.

Given the colossal amount of praise they’ve had thrusted upon them, many would have diluted their sound and churned out an album of dull, chart-baiting pop hits, but the London quartet actually appearing to be getting heavier, and more cutting. Another track that encapsulates the ferocity of their live performances, _Storm_ will no doubt be another favourite on their forthcoming tour, dates below.

_Storm_ is lifted from **_Creature Songs_**, out 26 May, [pre-order here](https://itunes.apple.com/gb/album/creature-songs-ep-ep/id859015269?ign-mpt=uo%3D4).
